tossup_question: 10) MATH  Consider the graph of the function 4x^2 – 4y^2 = 0. Which of the following shapes most resembles the graph of this function?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Circle 
X) Hyperbola 
Y) Pair of intersecting straight lines 
Z) Ellipse
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Y) PAIR OF INTERSECTING STRAIGHT LINES
bonus_question: 10) MATH  If x + y = 1 and x minus y equals the product of the square root of 2 and the sine of theta, what is x times y?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Cosine of 2 theta
X) Sine of 2 theta 
Y) One-fourth the cosine of 2 theta
 Z) One-fourth the sine of 2 theta
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Y) ONE-FOURTH THE COSINE OF 2 THETA
